from.description: If specified, only this submersion type will be modified. Accepts either `"none"` , `"water"` or `"lava"`
from.markdownDescription: If specified, only this submersion type will be modified. Accepts either `"none"` , `"water"` or `"lava"`

to.description: Which submersion type to change to. Accepts either `"none"`, `"water"` or `"lava"`
to.markdownDescription: Which submersion type to change to. Accepts either `"none"`, `"water"` or `"lava"`

type.description:
## Modify Camera Submersion

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_camera_submersion)

Modifies how the player perceives the world, similarly to when they're submerged in fluids like water or lava.

Type ID: `origins:modify_camera_submersion`




---

### Examples

```json
{
  "type": "origins:modify_camera_submersion",
  "from": "none",
  "to": "water"
}
```

This example will make it look like the player is submerged in Water if the player is not submerged in any fluid.
